name: Poison Plant
description:
Poison Plant is a survival platform game where you have to survive as many waves as possible while trying not to get hit by enemies.

Special powers boost the speed and the jump. You can get special powers every 5 rounds.

Controls :

  • Arrows
  • WASD (for Qwerty keyboards)
  • ZQSD (for Azerty keyboards)
  • Space to enable special power.
